Package client

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
ocsf.client.AbstractClient
client.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientController extends ocsf.client.AbstractClient
The main client-side controller that manages the connection to the server, handles incoming messages, and provides access to GUI components. This class extends AbstractClient and implements the core logic for message handling and GUI coordination in the BPARK system.
Author:
BPARK

    • ClientController

      public ClientController(String host, int port, MainMenuController guiController) throws IOException
      Constructs a new client controller and opens the connection to the server.
      Parameters:
      host - the server host
      port - the server port
      guiController - the main menu GUI controller
      Throws:
      IOException - if connection fails
